attributes.title: PARAMASHIVA DIRECTLY MAKING HIMSELF AVAILABLE TO ALL (21 Mar 2020, Nithya Satsang)
attributes.description:
Here PARAMASHIVA directly makes HIMSELF available to humanity using the body, muscle memory, bio memory, and bio energy of Sri Nithyananda Paramashivam. In HIS compassion PARAMASHIVA declares 
"*NOW THE RELATIONSHIP IS ABSOLUTELY BETWEEN YOU AND ME. IT IS ABSOLUTELY YOU AND ME. ALLOW ME TO FILL YOU. ALLOW MY BEING INSIDE YOU.
*WHEN YOU START TASTING MY BEING, ALL YOUR PAST FEARS, GREEDS, POWERLESSNESS, EVERYTHING WILL JUST BECOME IRRELEVANT. YOU WILL BE SHOWERED WITH THE BOONS YOU ASK AND WHAT YOU CAN NEVER EVEN IMAGINE. YOU WILL UNDERSTAND THE HIGHEST ULTIMATE DIMENSIONS OF THE LIFE AND UNIVERSE.
*IF YOU HAVE BEEN BEGGING FOR FEW TONNES OF GOLD, YOU ARE GOING TO BE GRANTED HILLS OF DIAMONDS, NOT JUST FEW TONNES OF GOLD WHICH YOU ARE ASPIRING...HILLS OF DIAMONDS BEYOND YOU CAN EVEN ASK OR IMAGINE.
*ALL YOUR FEARS AND GREEDS WILL BECOME IRRELEVANT. THE FIRST THING PARAMASHIVA BEING-ME GOING TO DO IN YOU ALL, MANIFEST MY STATE, SPACE, POWERS INTENSELY. MAKE YOURSELF AVAILABLE FOR EVERY SESSION. NOTHING ELSE IS NEEDED. JUST MAKE YOURSELF AVAILABLE.
*ANYONE MAKES YOURSELF AVAILABLE, I WILL MAKE MYSELF AVAILABLE TO YOU.
*ALL THE WORDS I AM UTTERING ARE MANTRA.
*I AM NOT GOING TO GIVE YOU ANY TEACHING. I AM NOT GOING TO GIVE YOU ANY TECHNIQUE. I AM JUST DIRECTLY UTTERING EVERY WORD WHICH IS MANTRA TO MANIFEST IN YOUR BEING. I AM MANIFESTING PARAMASHIVA-MYSELF COMPLETELY, SO YOUR BRAIN CAN MIRROR THIS NEURON ACTIVITIES.
*UNDERSTAND: THIS WHOLE PROGRAM IS NOT ORDINARY SPIRITUAL PROGRAM. IT IS PARAMASHIVA-ME DIRECTLY MAKING MYSELF AVAILABLE TO ALL OF YOU THROUGH THIS BODY, USING THIS BODY AND MEMORY - MUSCLE MEMORY, BIO MEMORY, AND BIO ENERGY.
*MAKE YOURSELF JUST AVAILABLE, SO I CAN MANIFEST THROUGH THIS BODY AND MANIFEST IN ALL OF YOU. EVERY WORD I AM UTTERING IS THE MANTRA. I AM MANIFESTING IN THIS SYSTEM COMPLETELY SO YOU CAN ALL JUST MIRROR THE NEURON ACTIVITIES OF THIS SYSTEM AND MANIFEST THE BEING OF PARAMASHIVA.
*MAKE YOURSELF AVAILABLE FOR THE WHOLE PROGRAM - WHETHER MORNING YOGA OR PADA PUJA, ALL THAT MATTERS. ALL THAT PREPARES YOU, DETOXES YOU TO MIRROR MY NEURON ACTIVITIES, TO HOLD MY BEING TO MANIFEST ME. MORNING YOGA, PUJA, EVERYTHING PREPARES YOU. WHETHER INTRO OR OUTRO, ATTEND THE WHOLE PROGRAM. MAKE YOURSELF AVAILABLE COMPLETELY THIS WHOLE 16 DAYS.
*NOW I WILL INITIATE ALL OF YOU, EVERYONE OF YOU, AS PARAMASHIVA, INTO SHIVA MULA MANTRA DEEKSHA -THE PASSWORD TO CONNECT WITH MYSELF. ALL OF YOU RECEIVE THE INITIATION EVEN IF YOU HAVE RECEIVED EARLIER THROUGH THE BEING OF NITHYANANDA. NOW I AM INITIATING ALL OF YOU AS PARAMASHIVA DIRECTLY.
*FIRST GAYATRI MANTRA - THE PASSCODE TO CONNECT WITH MY SHINE, MY TEJAS, MY LIGHT, MY SPACE, MY EFFULGENCE. THE SUPERNAL EFFULGENCE OF ME IS GAYATRI. RECEIVE THIS MANTRA, TO CONNECT WITH MY SUPERNAL EFFULGENCE.
*NOW SHIVA MULA MANTRA - SHIVA DEEKSHA, SAMAYA DEEKSHA MANTRA - PASSCODE TO CONNECT DIRECTLY WITH ME - PARAMASHIVA.
*NOW MAHAVAKYA INITIATION. MAHAVAKYA IS THE COMPLETION OF YOU AND ME - YOU MANIFESTING ME, ME MANIFESTING IN YOU. THIS IS THE ULTIMATE: YOU CONNECTING WITH ME AND ME MANIFESTING IN YOU. WHOLE THING HAPPENS THROUGH THIS MAHAVAKYA. IT IS ABSOLUTE COMPLETION - ABSOLUTE COMPLETE SOUND.
*PARAMASHIVA - ME, WILL CONNECT ALL OF YOU DIRECTLY TO ME AND MY KAILASA. YOU WILL ALL MANIFEST MY VERY BEING NOW. THROUGH THIS INITIATION I BLESS YOU ALL: EVERYDAY SATSANG WILL BECOME EXPERIENCE FOR ALL OF YOU. EVERY DAY WHEN YOU DO PUJA, YOU WILL ALL CONNECT WITH PARAMASHIVA-ME DIRECTLY. EVERYDAY WHEN YOU DO NITHYANANDA YOGA, YOU WILL DIRECTLY EXPERIENCE KUNDALINI AWAKENING. EVERYDAY WHEN YOU DO POWER MANIFESTATION, YOU WILL DIRECTLY EXPERIENCE ONENESS WITH MY BEING - PARAMASHIVA.
*I BLESS YOU ALL AND INITIATE, AUTHORISE ALL OF YOU INTO CHARYA PADA, KRIYA PADA, YOGA PADA AND JNANA PADA"
